title: Chat Banned for complaining about inter all game
body:
Am i really supposed to not whine about someone on my team intentionally losing the game? If venting IN THE GAME ITS HAPPENING IN isn't okay...wtf is? Im not the freaking dali lama and bitching about a troll is super normal. I think it got picked by the algorithm because i swore, but im not sure. Is it really true that the other 99% of LoL players are like super patient never flaming monks? Even when they're matched with someone sabatoging lane they dont call them out? 

Here's the full text they gave me of my negative behavior, i bolded what i think the flammiest stuff is, keep in mind much of this is a direct response to other people calling it out:
Game 1
In-Game

ZeekZero: 2 kills dude
ZeekZero: engage them
ZeekZero: we win
ZeekZero: GO IN TAHM
ZeekZero: GO IN PLEASE
**ZeekZero: useless supp wont fight...**
**ZeekZero: tahm leave my lane...**
ZeekZero: youre stealing xp
ZeekZero: yea ik
ZeekZero: i cant get tahm to do anything
ZeekZero: he literally hides behind me
ZeekZero: se

**ZeekZero: well u guys win bot**
ZeekZero: and we have no supp and half an adc
ZeekZero: mf still tanking for tahm
ZeekZero: lol

ZeekZero: im not tanking for tahm anymore

ZeekZero: and i still engaged anyway..
ZeekZero: he didnt take a single hit until after you died.
**ZeekZero: LOL
ZeekZero: I ENGAGED DUMBASS
ZeekZero: TAHM DID NOT
ZeekZero: yea hes trolling..**
ZeekZero: refuses to cooperate
ZeekZero: no...
**ZeekZero: cus autistic people can take direction
ZeekZero: hes going out of his way to fk up**
**ZeekZero: 4 on 5 been gg since i started crying at like 4 min**
ZeekZero: gottem
ZeekZero: support sabatoge no problem
ZeekZero: i was staring at your hp like NO YES NO YES WAIT NO YES
ZeekZero: lol
**ZeekZero: all 4 report tahm**
ZeekZero: ban him easy
ZeekZero: yea u ran into it :)
ZeekZero: im just glad im relevant
ZeekZero: in a game with a troll supp
ZeekZero: go back in
ZeekZero: first thing tahms said
ZeekZero: hasnt tanked a single time
ZeekZero: 35 min
ZeekZero: lol
ZeekZero: ok good idea
ZeekZero: u flashed for that?
ZeekZero: r u srs?
ZeekZero: no akali
ZeekZero: flashed over wall to chase
ZeekZero: gg
ZeekZero: report tahm


LMK if this really is toxic behavior or if its acceptable to flame people who are actively losing on purpose.

replies.body:
Toxic is toxic.
Regardless of who it's towards to. 
Doesn't matter who you do it to you're not permitted to do it in general. Period.

So just avoid typing if you can't use the chat function properly.

**Strategies, encouragements, goals, objectives, or friendly conversation.**
That's the proper use. 

That doesn't include people's certain standards of joke that can be taken offensively, context does not matter, also not permitted to call out teammates nor enemies, regardless of what it is. Not ever allowed to ask for reports due to the fact it's considered as harassing. You cannot be inflammatory. Not permitted to insult, provoke, nor try to play at other players expenses. 

Riot will not tolerate anything that is against the Terms of Use.
Yes, a chat restriction is reasonable when you spent the entire match harassing someone. No, there is no exception for "but he deserved it."

FYI, asking for reports is considered harrassing someone and is itself a bannable offense.

This is because there is no point.

1 report is equal to 9.
Toxicity is toxicity, no matter the target. You are just feeding the trolls by engaging with them in chat. Mute, report and move on.
Riot again, banning the wrong people. Sigh
People who are actually "Autistic" are amazing individuals, you should never use that term as a pejorative.
